Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory984.jpg'}
{3: "The intruders become targets for the Hetero-Creatures, which surge and snap their jaws as they move en masse toward the three outsiders in the abandoned research facility's basement."}
{3: "After unlocking the door with the found keycard, Wanshi, Rosetta, and the Raven's Commandant immediately dash through the gates of the Cultivation Area."}
{3: 'Fortunately, the door is exceptionally sturdy—even the Hetero-Creatures cannot break through for now. The three of them finally have a moment to catch their breath.'}
{2: 'What is down there...', 3: '7'}
{3: "You nearly trip over something underfoot. Looking down, you discover it's a dismembered Construct limb."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Careful. Something's not right here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You noticed it when Rosetta forced the door open—'}
{3: 'Behind this door to the Cultivation Area lies a mountain of broken Construct remains.'}
{3: 'The three of you stand among the remains, stunned by a scene that defies all your expectations.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: '...These remains only started piling up here about two years ago... when the Ascendants first claimed this place as their stronghold.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So someone has been standing guard here since then...', 3: '17'}
{2: "And they've eliminated all the Constructs approaching the Cultivation Area!", 3: '18'}
{3: 'Rosetta carefully grabs the arm of a discarded Construct and drags it out, gravely pointing to a long, horrific gash across its neck.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'It\'s not a human that\'s guarding this place—I\'m starting to believe that the "monster" really does exist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'It matches the traces I found upstairs.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Another modified terminal falls from the pile of remains, rolls to Wanshi's feet, and he picks it up."}
{2: 'Another clue left by Shorthalt?', 3: '26'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Yes... these were left by Shorthalt. We're on the right track—he was leading us to the Cultivation Area.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's voice suddenly drops."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The children he wanted to save are just behind this door...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "The timing's wrong... These things were left here too recently.", 4: '1'}
{3: "For the first time, you see anguish in Wanshi's eyes."}
{3: 'Wanshi presses the button, and the terminal containing the messages boots up with a harsh static noise still present.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "There's no way to deal with all the security personnel outside. There are too many of them."}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "I'll hold them off. If more of them come after..."}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "If there's still a chance... I'll get the remaining test subjects... get those children out of here."}
{2: 'So these piled up remains of deserter Constructs...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'These were the enemies Shorthalt spoke of.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi looks again at the Cultivation Area, where years of dust swirl in the air. This place, which Shorthalt had mentioned housed child test subjects, now stands completely empty.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Shorthalt was the one guarding the Cultivation Area...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He finally voiced that most absurd theory.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '...What the Ascendants created... that hatched egg...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'It must have been "him" all along...!', 4: '1'}
